usage: lino openmail FILE

Start the user's default mail client with a ready-to-send message whose content
is previously read from FILE.  FILE describes the contents of the message using
a simplified pseudo RFC822 format.  Supported message header fields are "to",
"subject", and the "body".  "to" is mandatory, the other fields are optional.
options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  -v, --verbose         increase verbosity
  -q, --quiet           decrease verbosity
  -b, --batch           not interactive (don't ask anything)
  -lLOGFILE, --logfile=LOGFILE
                        log a report to FILE
